amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 967, the amendment printed in the Rules Committee report is considered as adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 967, the amendment printed in the Rules Committee report is considered as adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
